events.name: A track is paused/stopped
events.description: Triggered when a track is paused or stopped on Spotify.

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: The ID of the track that is paused or stopped.

events.name: Play/Pause a track
events.description: Pause the currently playing track on Spotify.

events.name: Skip to the previous track
events.description: Skip to the previous track on Spotify.

events.name: Skip to the next track
events.description: Skip to the next track on Spotify.

events.name: Add track to a playlist
events.description: Add a track to a specific Spotify playlist.

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: The ID of the track to add.

parameters.name: playlist_name
parameters.description: The name of the playlist to which the track should be added.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position in the the playlist where the track should be added. (if empty, the track will be added at the end)
